How to use the App: 
 - Login with user name and password 
 - Click “Add” or ”Add new Recipt” button to add new receipe 
 - Find receipe by clicking “Find a receipe” button 
 - Click Delete button to delete receipe 
 - Click Edit button to edit saved receipe 
 - Click receipt image to open saved receipe 
 
How to navigate: 
 - go back to last page by clicking the “back” button at bottom left 
 - go back to home page by clicking “back to homepage” button
